segments.text: I really like my debate class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think you'll be interested in studying law later ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've entertained the idea . But I'm I leaning more toward politics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You want to be a politician ? Yuck .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not like you to generalize .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry , you're right . I think you'll be a good politician .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I can do a lot of good for our country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right . We need more people like you in politics .
segments.speaker: S2
